text: YOU: Hey there, Nick! I didn't expect to see you here! NICK FURY: Who were you expecting, Parker... Santa Clause? My apologies for yanking you out of class. I'm all sorts of torn up about it... Now the point: there's a matter of national security needs tending to. YOU: How very unfortunate for you. NICK FURY: We, Parker. We. Your country needs you. YOU: And by the country you mean -- you... right? NICK FURY: Chicken and the egg, Parker. Chicken and the egg.
